Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Western, Blue Island, Damen, and Cermak due to, street blcoakage near Cermak/Hyone.
